DOC.brief_title: Developing In-vitro Diagnostic Risk-Stratification Test Oral Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Saliva sample collect patient clinically driven oral biopsy lesion suspicious cancer . Specimens process laboratory personnel blind tissue diagnosis . Six pre-specified mRNA marker ( IL1b , IL8 , SAT , DUSP1 , OAZ1 S100P ) measure polymerase chain reaction . Markers compare cancer control raw Ct value well delta Ct adjustment housekeep gen . Appropriate housekeep gene identify random subset cancer control patient verify remain subject . Predictive model generate pre-specified method robustness evaluate bootstrap analysis . The model validate second cohort . Three pre-specified protein marker ( IL8 , IL1B , M2BP ) secondary endpoint also compare cancer control patient .
